class.name: LightOccluder2D
class.brief_description: Occludes light cast by a Light2D, casting shadows.
class.description: Occludes light cast by a Light2D, casting shadows. The LightOccluder2D must be provided with an [OccluderPolygon2D] in order for the shadow to be computed.

method.name: get_occluder_light_mask
method.description: Return the light mask of the LightOccluder2D.

method.name: get_occluder_polygon
method.description: Return the OccluderPolygon2D that defines the LightOccluder2D.

method.name: set_occluder_light_mask
method.description: Set the LightOccluder2D light mask. The LightOccluder2D will cast shadows only from Light2Ds that belong to the same light mask(s).

method.name: set_occluder_polygon
method.description: Set the OccluderPolygon2D that defines the LightOccluder2D.

members.member: The LightOccluder2D's light mask. The LightOccluder2D will cast shadows only from Light2D(s) that have the same light mask(s).
The [OccluderPolygon2D] used to compute the shadow.
